title: How to Watch Leicester vs Liverpool : Liverpool vs Leicester City : Live streaming , prediction , kick - off time , TV coverage , team updates , head - to - head results
body_text:
Leicester has been struggling lately, with just one win in their last 13 matches, which has left them in a precarious position in the relegation zone. They now rely on other teams' assistance to improve their chances of survival.
In contrast, Liverpool has been in excellent form, winning six consecutive games and securing a spot in the top four. They have disrupted Leicester's usual presence in the race for Champions League qualification.
The match between Leicester and Liverpool is scheduled to kick off at 8pm BST tonight, May 15, 2023, at the King Power Stadium in Leicester. For those in the UK, the game will be broadcasted live on Sky Sports Main Event and Premier League. Monday Night Football coverage will begin at 6.30pm. Subscribers can also stream the match online via the Sky Go app.
For viewers in the US, the match will start at 15:00 (ET). The live streaming will be available on the USA Network.
In terms of prediction, despite Leicester's recent struggles, surprises can happen at this stage of the season. However, Liverpool is a formidable opponent, and they are expected to win convincingly with a scoreline of 3-0.
Looking at the head-to-head history, Leicester has won their last two home games against Liverpool, but overall, Liverpool has been the more successful team with 54 wins compared to Leicester's 41. There have also been 25 draws between the two sides in their previous encounters.
According to the match odds, Leicester is the underdog with odds of 9/2 to win, while a draw has odds of 18/5. Liverpool is the favorite to win with odds of 11/20.
FAQs
Q1. When is the next premier league match?
A1. The next premier league match is tonight.
Q2. When is Liverpool's next premier league match?
A2. Liverpool's next premier league match is tonight.
